definitions: Cover (a wall, ceiling, or other surface) with plaster.
Cover (a surface) with a substance in the manner of plaster.
Apply (a plaster or poultice) to a part of the body.
Figuratively, to be heavily intoxicated with alcohol.
examples: The walls were plastered with a smooth finish.
She plastered her hair back with gel.
The nurse plastered a bandage on his arm.
He got completely plastered at the party.
